= Macaron Java back door =

The back door can detect the environment and use different techniques
to inject a hook in the HTTP request work flow. Then, with the presence of
the key `M4c4r0n` in any field, an agent is presented.

 * [history-agent History]: Memorize last 20 requests
 * [jndi-agent JNDI]: Consult JNDI
 * [jmx-agent JMX]: Consult and invoke JMX
 * [jdc-agent JDBC]: Invoke database
 * [java-agent Java/Javascript]: Compile and execute code in the JavaEE server
 * [shell-agent Shell]: Invoke a shell
